name: 2048 5x5 Classic Edition
description:
2048 5x5 Classic Edition
Looking for an easier 2048? Here is your answer. Improved 5x5 gird marries the classic 2048 game design. Getting a 2048 has never been so easy.

Join the numbers in 5x5 grid and get to the 2048 tile!

Swipe to move all tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one.

Get to the 2048,4096 and even higher tile, and reach a high score!

Inspired by Gabriele Cirulli game available on the web: http://gabrielecirulli.github.io/2048/
